item.title: CsAKT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G029650 Gene Symbol: CsAKT1 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAKT1 is a key gene for the CeO2 nanoparticle’s improved cucumber salt tolerance: a validation from CRISPR-Cas9 lines.

item.title: GhHAK5aA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G1516 Gene Symbol: GhHAK5aA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton High-Affinity K+ Transporter, GhHAK5a, Is Essential for Shoot Regulation of K+ Uptake in Root under Potassium Deficiency.
